basic_information.scholarship_name: The Dr. J. David Macey Endowed Scholarship in Liberal Arts

description: In honor of Dr. Macey's service to the UCO community, this scholarship was created to support students who will benefit from his innovative legacy. Eligibility Criteria Must be pursuing a major or minor in the College of Liberal Arts Complete application Must upload an official transcript Minimum GPA of 2.5 Must be a Sophomore, Junior, or Senior Enrolled either part-time or full-time Preference will be given to students who demonstrate financial need This scholarship is available to apply for during the current UCO student application period.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
